Iâ€™m a memer
Ladder is full of idiots and Grit players that brick, so very easy KoG. Was L3 since first week thanks to Masked Heroes, chilled off ranked and hopped in today just to test a Ninja idea that came to mind
Notebook is the core card, you wanna see it every game. Mauso enables the big Ninjas similar to what 3sd did. RDN is disruptive and the main boss, BDN can still win games out of nowhere, SSN is worse than before but can be clutch. Sazank was the card I was testing, fun to Dupe into and a good answer for Anki ideally.
